basicUsage.title: 🚀 Basic Scheduler Usage
basicUsage.code:
var scheduler = new SchedulerEngine(() => Console.WriteLine("Hello World"));
scheduler.Start();

withCallbacks.title: 🔁 Scheduler with Callbacks
withCallbacks.code:
// Callbacks example
void NotifyServiceStarted(DateTime t) => Console.WriteLine($"✅ Started at {t}");
